subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Bill Curry coached Alabama from 1987 to 1989 and now leads Georgia State, which is 6-4 in its inaugural season of college football. The teams will play Thursday night.
snippet: Bill Curry coached Alabama from 1987 to 1989 and now leads Georgia State, which is 6-4 in its inaugural season of college football. The teams will play Thursday night.
